_comment: Checkpoint evaluation sample set - representative assets per category for quick testing
description: A diverse sample of asset types to quickly evaluate a new checkpoint's suitability
usage: 1. Create an empty variant folder: mkdir assets/zelos_variants/<newckpt>
2. Run validator to get a report: py -3.11 scripts/validate-assets.py --root assets/zelos_variants/<newckpt> --report json --report-path build/<newckpt>-report.json

3. Generate the test samples: py -3.11 scripts/comfyui/generate-assets.py --report build/<newckpt>-report.json --variant <newckpt> --ckpt <ckpt_filename> --prompt-style <juggernaut|animagine|pony|protovision|sdxl|copax> --fit-vram --auto-alpha --only "<REGEX_FROM_BELOW>"
Optional VAE override: add --vae <vae_filename.safetensors> (requires VAELoader in the workflow)

samples.notes: Core character - check proportions, lineart quality, transparency, view consistency
Expression overlays - should be face-only, not full character; check alignment potential
Outfit overlays - should be costume pieces only, no body redraw
Spherical planets - check round silhouette, terminator shadow, no background, variety
Ring overlay - should be semi-transparent, no planet body
Atmosphere overlays - soft gradient halos, no planet body, visible thickness difference
State overlays - neon accent ring/glow, no planet body, distinguishable states
UI icons - clean readable silhouette, crisp edges at small size, distinguishable
State overlays - ring/glow variants, clearly distinguishable at 128x128
Glow overlays - soft neon halo rings, distinguishable intensity
Badge overlays - small badges anchored to corner area, distinguishable

evaluation_criteria.transparency: Background should be cleanly transparent (check corners for leftover pixels)
evaluation_criteria.sharpness: Lineart should be crisp, not blurry or fuzzy
evaluation_criteria.consistency: Style should match across samples (line weight, shading, palette)
evaluation_criteria.isolation: Subject should be centered with no cropping or edge bleeding
evaluation_criteria.prompt_adherence: Asset should match the requested type (overlay vs full character, etc.)
evaluation_criteria.variety: Different variants (planets, expressions) should be visually distinguishable
